detail.title: Adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Sand Taupe
detail.desc: For their last few releases of the year, adidas Yeezy is starting strong with their widely beloved Yeezy Boost 350 v2. Hued in “Sand Taupe,” the upcoming colorway doesn’t stray too far from the brand’s perceivable comfort zone, likening itself to many of the standouts offered prior.
